review: I love the device but I've been having a problem with the video not showing up after the FireTV goes to sleep. I can hear that it comes on but there is no audio. I may have to return it for an exchange.The voice search is great and the fact that the phone app works equally well for both the FireTV and the FireTV Stick is great. However, I wish that the voice search/interface worked inside of the Apps. I also wish that the search function looked inside the apps (I.e. Searched Plex for the video you just looked up. This function seems to work for Hulu pretty well). Filtering needs to be improved. For example, I sometimes want to be able to search for items that are included with Prime only and not have to search from a computer or click on the item before finding that out.What is also interesting is that I haven't noticed much of an improvement in my experience from the FireTV Stick in terms of performance/speed. But I do have several options and apps I didn't have before.
author: PhrozenBlur
